org.diylc.common
Enum DrawOption

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Enum<DrawOption>
      org.diylc.common.DrawOption
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<DrawOption>
public enum DrawOption
extends java.lang.Enum<DrawOption>

Enumerates all options that can be used when drawing a project.

Author:
Branislav Stojkovic
See Also:
IPlugInPort.draw(java.awt.Graphics2D, java.util.Set, IComponentFiler)

Enum Constant Summary
ANTIALIASING
          Anti-aliasing is used when drawing.
CONTROL_POINTS
          Control points are drawn.
GRID
          Grid lines are drawn.
OUTLINE_MODE
          Draw components in outline mode.
SELECTION
          Selection rectangle will be drawn when needed and selected components may be rendered differently.
ZOOM
          Selected zoom level will be applied to scale the Graphics before drawing.
